Steps to reproduce:
1) In a file put the following contents:
package test0460;

		buf.append("package test1;\n");
		buf.append("public class E {\n");
		buf.append("    public void foo() {\n");
		buf.append("        z= foo().y.toList();\n");
		buf.append("    }\n");
		buf.append("}\n");	
2) Select the first line till the double-quote (		buf.append(").
3) Ctrl + F
And simply click on replace all.

When I want to close the editor, I can save it and the right source is saved
(after replacement).

I don't know if these steps will always work, but at least the stacktrace should
be able to help.
